pages.text: Thus, the same was said about every messenger who came before them, "(He is) a magician! A lunatic
Do they leave this remark as a legacy (for future generations)? No! They are the defiant sinners, all of them
Turn away from them. You share no blame
But continue to remind them. Of course, the reminder (always) helps the believers
I have not created the jinn and the human kind, (for any reason) except that they should worship Me
I want no riches from them, and do not want them to feed Me
Indeed, the provider of sustenance (for all beings) is Allah, the One with absolute Power and matchless Might
Indeed! The evildoers of the present day shall have the same fate as those of their companions (in hellfire), the evil doers of the past. So, let them not ask Me to hasten (the Day of Judgment)
So, on that day of theirs, the promised day, there shall be (nothing but) misery for those who disbelieve
(Allah swears) by the mountain, Toor
And by the book inscribed
On fine parchment __ an open book, (the QurÂ´an), distributed (and found) all over
And (He swears) by the oft-visited house (of worship, the Kaaba in Makkah)
And the high (elevated) ceiling, (the sky)
And the surging sea
(He swears that) the punishment of your Lord shall definitely come to pass
Which absolutely no one can avert
The sky, that day, would rock and reel fiercely
Set in motion, the mountains will slide about briskly
There is misery that day for (all) those who denied (the revelation)
Those who stayed engrossed in (fruitless) pastimes
Pushed (and shoved) towards the hellfire (with disdain), they would be thrust into it with force
This is the fire you had refused to believe
